objects.text:
• 925 Sterling Silver Certified
• Exquisite Pink Crystal Design
• Perfect Gift for Her

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description:
- Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g.
- Item part number: ER0583.
- Country of Origin: India.
- Department: womens.
- Item Weight: 3.9 g.
- Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters.
- Net Quantity: 2.00 count.
- Generic Name: Stud Earrings.
- Customer Reviews: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 69 ratings.

banner_details:
This elegant and softly feminine banner is designed to promote a jewelry product using a refined pastel theme. The layout is symmetrically divided, with text content aligned to the left and a visual product image to the right side. The background is a soothing gradient of blush pink, decorated with abstract wavy lines and semi-transparent gradients in circular shapes that add to the soft, dreamy aesthetic. Bold headline text (id: "heading") commands attention with a modern font in rich rose-pink. A subheading (id: "subheading") below it gives refined detail, followed by a descriptive bullet list (id: "description"). The price (id: "price") is emphasized in bold typography, while a call to action button (id: "cta_background" and "cta") stands out with contrast. The tagline (id: "tagline") at the bottom subtly reinforces brand identity. 

Color Palette:
- Light Blush Pink (#FFF5F6)
- Warm Rose Pink (#D65B70)
- Deep Rose Accent (#C26C7A)
- Soft Mauve (#E8A7AD)
- Charcoal Brown (#5A4950)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings with a delicate and feminine color palette. The dominant color is a soft rose gold (#F4A6A6), which outlines the structure and adds a luxurious warmth. This rose shade seamlessly blends with the blush pink enamel (#F7C8C8) featured in the petal-like elements. Complementing these are the brilliant white and clear crystal stones (#FFFFFF and #E5E5E5), which add sparkle and contrast. The color blending is subtle, with a soft gradient that highlights the curves and shines, making the jewelry appear more refined. This palette is ideal for creating a soft, glamorous advertisement banner.
